dct:title.value: Management strategies for Pearl Millet Downy Mildew (Sclerospora graminicola)

bibo:abstract.value: The effect of soil application of botanicals (i.e. cakes of neem, mustard, linseed and til, plant extracts of neem, datura, eucalyptus, parthenium and calotropis, butter milk &cow urine), the cow urine, butter milk, oil cakes and botanicals imparted a significant role on the control of downy mildew in pearl millet. Application of butter milk @ 5% (33.2%) was found most effective in respect of downy mildew control.
